General.Name: Zhejiang Southeast Space Frame Co Ltd
General.Description: Zhejiang Southeast Space Frame Co., Ltd. designs, manufactures, and installs structural and residential steel structures in China. The company offers space steel structure, light and heavy steel structure, and polyester filament. It also researches, develops, produces, and sells chemical fiber products. In addition, the company engages in construction steel structure related businesses. Its steel structure buildings focuses on health and real estate sectors. Zhejiang Southeast Space Frame Co., Ltd. was founded in 1984 and is headquartered in Hangzhou, China.

2.Name: Mr. Jin Ming  Tian
2.Title: Deputy Gen. Mang. & Sec. of Board
